mapper.select: select Go_BLOOD_TEST_CODE, GO_TREAT_CODE, GO_BLOOD_TEST_BLOOD_SUGAR, GO_BLOOD_TEST_PLATELET, GO_BLOOD_TEST_FILE_PATH , GO_BLOOD_TEST_FILE_NAME , GO_BLOOD_TEST_DATE, GO_BLOOD_TEST_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE from go_test_blood_result where GO_TREAT_CODE = #{treatCode}

select go_test_blood_result.Go_BLOOD_TEST_CODE, go_test_blood_result.GO_TREAT_CODE, go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_BLOOD_SUGAR, go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_PLATELET, go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_FILE_PATH , go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_FILE_NAME , go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_DATE, go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE from go_test_blood_result join go_treat on go_test_blood_result.GO_TREAT_CODE = go_treat.GO_TREAT_CODE join go_citizen on go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_ID = go_treat.GO_CITIZEN_ID where go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_ID = #{citizenId} order by go_test_blood_result.GO_BLOOD_TEST_DATE asc

select GO_IMAGE_TEST_CODE, GO_TREAT_CODE, GO_IMAGE_TEST_FILE_PATH, GO_IMAGE_TEST_FILE_NAME, GO_IMAGE_TEST_DATE, GO_IMAGE_TEST_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE from go_test_image_result where GO_TREAT_CODE = #{treatCode}

select go_test_image_result.GO_IMAGE_TEST_CODE, go_test_image_result.GO_TREAT_CODE, go_test_image_result.GO_IMAGE_TEST_FILE_PATH, go_test_image_result.GO_IMAGE_TEST_FILE_NAME, go_test_image_result.GO_IMAGE_TEST_DATE, go_test_image_result.GO_IMAGE_TEST_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE from go_test_image_result join go_treat on go_test_image_result.GO_TREAT_CODE = go_treat.GO_TREAT_CODE join go_citizen on go_treat.GO_CITIZEN_ID = go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_ID where go_treat.GO_CITIZEN_ID = #{citizenId}
